specialTipSize.specialTip: The employee who reads the book will gain a certain level of Prudence.
The employee can read the book until the employee’s Prudence reaches the limit.
The more the employee reads, the more the employee becomes vulnerable to White damage.
Any employee who panics after reading this book will die.
